INSTRUCTIONS:
Kani nga calculator nag suporta sa aning mga operasyon:
  • Addition ('+')
  • Subtraction ('-')
  • Multiplication ('x')
  • Division ('÷')
  • Pi ('π')
  • Reset ('AC')
  • Square Root ('√')
  • Square Root ('√')
  • Percentage ('%')


Example:
Addition: 1 + 1 + 1 + 5 = 8
Subtraction: 12 - 2 = 10
Multiplication: 3 x 3 x 10 = 90
Division: 1000 / 200 = 5
